黵字的基本解释

黵
dǎn
黑，黑色：“翠岭中横，黵然黛色。”
黥，古代在犯人或奴婢、士兵脸上刺字：“遇赦降死者，黵面为劫字。”
用笔墨涂改文字：“就案上取一卷文书拘黵之。”

黵
zhǎn
方言，污染；弄脏：白衣服不禁黵。

黵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǎn］
［《廣韻》都敢切，上敢，端。］
(1)苍黑貌。
(2)用墨涂去。
(3)古时在罪人或兵士的脸上刺字。参见“黵面”。
[②]［zhǎn］
［《集韻》止染切，上琰，章。］
方言。弄脏；染污。

黵字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黑字部】　黵； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1522第17
【唐韻】當敢切【集韻】覩敢切，?音膽。【說文】大污也。【玉篇】黑?也。【廣韻】大污垢黑。　又【梁律】凡盜黵面爲劫字，至天監中，除黵面之?。　又【集韻】吐敢切，音菼。黑也。　又止染切，音?。義同。

黵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
黵字的起名意思

暂无。

黵
Basic explanation of words
黵
dǎn
Black, black: "Cui Ling is in the middle, and the color is dark and dark."
Tattoos were tattooed on the faces of prisoners, slaves, and soldiers in ancient times: "When a pardon surrenders the dead, the face is called robbery."
Use pen and ink to alter the text: "Take a volume of papers on the case to deter him."
黵
zhǎn
Dialects, pollution; dirty: white clothes can't help but dazzle.
黵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǎn］
["Guangyun" dare to cut, dare to go, end. ]
(1) Cang and black appearance.
(2) Paint it out with ink.
(3) In ancient times, tattoos were made on the faces of sinners or soldiers. See "Fu Nian".
[②]［zhǎn］
["Jiyun" stop dyeing and cutting, Shangyan, chapter. ]
dialect. Soiled; stained.
黵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Black Word Department] 　黵; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1522 Page 17
[Tang Yun] When dare to cut [Ji Yun] Dare to cut, sound gall. [Said the text] There is a big pollution. [Jade articles] Black? Also. [Guangyun] Big dirt is black.　[Liang Law] Everyone who steals the noodles is the word for robbery, and in the Tianjian, except for the noodles.　[Jiyun] Spit and dare to cut, sound 菼. Black also.　Stop dyeing and cutting again, sound?. The same meaning.
黵
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Japanese Ming Dynasty
Korean Ming Dynasty
Old glyph
黵
Name meaning
Nothing.
dǎn
Idǎn
(1) 污黑, 浓黑, 又泛指黑 black
黵, 大污也。 从黑, 詹声。 --《说文》
(2) 又如: 黵袍(黑袍子); 黵暗(黑暗; 无光)
IIdǎn
(1) 刺字 tattoo。 如: 黵面(在脸上刺字)
(2) 用笔墨涂掉文字 blot out。 如: 黵字(涂掉文字); 黵改(涂改)
(3) 另见 zhǎn
IIIzhǎn
方: 弄脏; 染污 make dirty。 如: 墨水把纸黵了; 黑布禁(jīn)
